subject: Career
title: LinkedIn: The Professional Homepage
description: A short lesson to help you apply LinkedIn: The Professional Homepage.

hook.text: 97% of recruiters use LinkedIn. If your profile is empty, you're invisible.

buildup.text: Your headline, summary, and experience form a mini-pitch that runs 24/7.

discovery.text: Profiles with professional photos get 14x more views. Custom headlines get 5x more connection requests.

twist.text: Most people list job duties. Winners list achievements with numbers and outcomes.

climax.text: Treat your LinkedIn like a landing page: clear headline, compelling summary, proof of results.

punchline.text: Your LinkedIn works while you sleep. Make it say the right things.

quiz.question: What percentage of recruiters use LinkedIn?
